thread.title: Road: A1 northbound South Yorkshire accident
thread.title_full: Road: A1 northbound South Yorkshire accident | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Road: A1 northbound South Yorkshire accident
text:
Two lanes are closed on the A1 northbound at Skellow in South Yorkshire after an accident involving several vehicles.
It happened between A638 and A639/A6021 Wrangbrook Lane. There is congestion on A1 (M) to junction 37 A635 Barnsley Road (Marr) and on M18 to junction 2 A1 (M).
Traffic is being affected travelling towards Pontefract from Wadworth.
Last updated Sat 1 Aug 2015 Travel South Yorkshire Skellow
